nodes.documentation:
@title BasicAMBMediator
@dev Basic storage and methods needed by mediators to interact with AMB bridge.
nodes.name: BasicAMBMediator

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if caller on the other side is not an associated mediator.
nodes.name: onlyMediator

nodes.documentation:
@dev Sets the AMB bridge contract address. Only the owner can call this method.
@param _bridgeContract the address of the bridge contract.
nodes.name: setBridgeContract

nodes.documentation:
@dev Sets the mediator contract address from the other network. Only the owner can call this method.
@param _mediatorContract the address of the mediator contract.
nodes.name: setMediatorContractOnOtherSide
setRequestGasLimit

nodes.documentation:
@dev Get the AMB interface for the bridge contract address
@return AMB interface for the bridge contract address
nodes.name: bridgeContract

nodes.documentation:
@dev Tells the mediator contract address from the other network.
@return the address of the mediator contract.
nodes.name: mediatorContractOnOtherSide

nodes.documentation:
@dev Tells the gas limit to be used in the message execution by the AMB bridge on the other network.
@return the gas limit for the message execution.
nodes.name: requestGasLimit

nodes.documentation:
@dev Stores a valid AMB bridge contract address.
@param _bridgeContract the address of the bridge contract.
nodes.name: _setBridgeContract

nodes.documentation:
@dev Stores the mediator contract address from the other network.
@param _mediatorContract the address of the mediator contract.
nodes.name: _setMediatorContractOnOtherSide

nodes.documentation:
@dev Stores the gas limit to be used in the message execution by the AMB bridge on the other network.
@param _requestGasLimit the gas limit for the message execution.
nodes.name: _setRequestGasLimit
messageSender

nodes.documentation:
@dev Tells the id of the message originated on the other network.
@return the id of the message originated on the other network.
nodes.name: messageId

nodes.documentation:
@dev Tells the maximum gas limit that a message can use on its execution by the AMB bridge on the other network.
@return the maximum gas limit value.
nodes.name: maxGasPerTx

attributes.documentation: @dev Throws if caller on the other side is not an associated mediator.

setRequestGasLimit

bridgeContract().details: Get the AMB interface for the bridge contract address
bridgeContract().return: AMB interface for the bridge contract address

mediatorContractOnOtherSide().details: Tells the mediator contract address from the other network.
mediatorContractOnOtherSide().return: the address of the mediator contract.

owner().details: Tells the address of the owner

requestGasLimit().details: Tells the gas limit to be used in the message execution by the AMB bridge on the other network.
requestGasLimit().return: the gas limit for the message execution.

setBridgeContract(address).details: Sets the AMB bridge contract address. Only the owner can call this method.

params._bridgeContract: the address of the bridge contract.

setMediatorContractOnOtherSide(address).details: Sets the mediator contract address from the other network. Only the owner can call this method.

params._mediatorContract: the address of the mediator contract.

setRequestGasLimit(uint256).details: Sets the gas limit to be used in the message execution by the AMB bridge on the other network. This value can't exceed the parameter maxGasPerTx defined on the AMB bridge. Only the owner can call this method.

params._requestGasLimit: the gas limit for the message execution.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: the address to transfer ownership to.
